Name: Scaloom AI
Tagline: Reddit marketing made-easy tool
Description: Scaloom is an AI-powered Reddit marketing tool that helps founders promote safely by building trust first. It warms up Reddit accounts with natural engagement to gain karma and credibility, then helps you find subreddits, create value-first posts, auto-reply to comments, and manage campaigns. No spam. No bans. Just Reddit marketing done right.

Name: Joodle
Tagline: Turn years of memories into personal doodles
Description: Capture life’s fleeting moments with simple daily doodles. No art skills needed—just draw what matters most. Joodle turns your everyday thoughts into a living visual timeline, with widgets that bring your memories right to your Home Screen. iCloud sync safely sync across all your devices. Count down to meaningful dates, explore experimental features, and discover new ways to reflect. Slowly, ordinary days transform into an extraordinary visual diary. Your story, one doodle at a time.

Name: Nutgrafe
Tagline: The news, reduced to what matters.
Description: A "nutgraf" is the paragraph in a news story that explains what it’s about and why it matters. Nutgrafe does that for every article. Our AI reads every article from the world’s top news sites, blogs, and publications and delivers the core of each story in summaries of 400 characters or less, all in a familiar feed (circa 2015). Expand any post for key points and context, or click through to the original source to read more.

Name: Everyessay
Tagline: AI essays, trained on winning human-briefs.
Description: EveryEssay isn’t trained on guesses. It’s trained on people who already won. Instead of hallucinating what reviewers want, the AI learns from real alumni essays, acceptance letters, and proven evaluation rubrics. No source, no output. The AI stays locked until enough human-verified wins unlock it. What you get isn’t a template or polished fluff—but the exact logic behind essays that passed. Not AI writing for you. AI backed by human proof.

Name: Builders.to
Tagline: Ship faster. Together.
Description: A members-only launchpad for builders. Share your work in progress, get feedback from the community, and find your first users. Part of the Builders.to community on X.

Name: Elser AI
Tagline: Create full anime shorts with just a prompt in minutes
Description: Elser AI helps creators turn ideas into full anime story videos. Just enter an idea, Elser AI could create long-form videos with consistent characters, clear story flow, and cinematic styles, all from a single prompt. In long-form benchmarks, Elser achieves 30%+ higher character consistency than other AI video tools across 180+ scenes. Built for storytellers, animators, and creators who want more than short clips.

Name: MailWell
Tagline: A gentler way to journal. Email replies, pods and insights.
Description: Journaling shouldn’t be a chore. Most journals stay empty because the blank page is intimidating. Mailwell meets you in your inbox. Reply to Reflect: Hit 'reply' to daily prompts. No apps, no friction. Speak Your Mind: Voice memos, auto-transcribed and synced. Deep Synthesis: A Weekly Reflection Letter highlighting your growth. Pods: Stay consistent with a private, small circle. Reflection is self-care, not a productivity hack. A simple conversation that builds your personal archive.

Name: Postloom
Tagline: Generate high-signal LinkedIn content 10x faster with Ai.
Description: Generate high-signal LinkedIn content 10x faster. AI that understands your business, creates professional posts, and helps you reach 10x more professionals.

Name: Notion Avatar Maker
Tagline: AI-powered online tool for making notion-style avatars.
Description: AI-powered online tool for making notion-style avatars, transform your photos or ideas into Notion-style avatars or illustrations with AI magic.

Name: BuildHub Studio
Tagline: A visual website builder without lock-in
Description: BuildHub focuses on architecture, performance, and creator ownership instead of lock-in. Unlike most visual website builders, all generated code belongs to the creator, with no export restrictions. It features a high-performance visual canvas with drag & drop, multi-viewport layouts, and efficient undo/redo, built to scale as a real product. BuildHub is free to use and is evolving into an ecosystem where creators can sell templates or services.

Name: OneURL
Tagline: OneURL for all your links, open-source alternative linktree
Description: Create a beautiful profile page to share all your important links in one place. Open source alternative to Linktree.

Name: FlowBot
Tagline: Ai Agents for Whatsapp and Website Customer Support
Description: Flowbot helps teams build AI agents for WhatsApp and website chat. Train agents on your docs, FAQs, and internal knowledge, then use visual workflows for complex logic and edge cases. With FlowAgent, AI can automatically generate WhatsApp workflows for you. Integrates with Google Sheets, Calendar, Gmail, and Docs. Runs on the official Meta Business API, with a shared inbox built for real support traffic.

Name: Tatva
Tagline: A digital museum for ancient Indian texts
Description: Project Tatva brings ancient Indian texts into a modern, structured digital library. Rooted in the idea of Sanskrit word Tatva (तत्त्व), the underlying truth beyond form the platform is built to make reading and exploration clearer, more connected, and meaningful. It thoughtfully organizes timeless works while preserving their philosophical and spiritual depth, helping readers engage with these texts in a more accessible and coherent way.

Name: Sahibukum - Quran, Qibla, Prayer Time
Tagline: Your companion in Islam
Description: - Most advanced Quran reader with stunning UI/UX in a mobile app. - Morning and evening Adhkar to memorize. - Explore mosques around the world. - Learn about As-Sabiqun Al-Awwalun, the firsts to accept islam. - Premium widgets for prayer times & Qibla finder. - Live updates on your notification bar for fastest way to see the prayer times. - Read the Quran from 30+ fonts. - 100+ Tafsirs in multiple languages. - 130+ Quran translations. - Listen to the reciter from 30+ options. - AR Qibla finder

Name: OiiOii
Tagline: Turn ideas into animated stories with AI agents
Description: OiiOii.ai is an AI animation platform where a team of intelligent agents collaborates to turn simple text or images into complete animated shorts. No complex tools, no animation skills required — just your imagination, brought to life in minutes. https://topaiproduct.com/2026/01/03/when-imagination-becomes-motion-inside-oiioii-ai/

Name: Supaleak
Tagline: Secret scanning for shipped-too-fast websites
Description: Supaleak scans live websites for exposed API keys, tokens, JWTs, Supabase keys, and other sensitive data before attackers do. For teams shipping fast with vibe coding, it checks real JavaScript files, validates leaks, and sends alerts so you can fix issues before they reach production. Features - Detect API keys, tokens, JWTs, Supabase keys, and more - Validates if leaked secrets are usable - Scheduled scans (daily, weekly, custom) - Email alerts on new leaks - CSV export for audits

Name: BetterTrumpet
Tagline: the volume mixer windows deserved
Description: a refined fork of eartrumpet, the beloved windows volume mixer. what's new: → music overlay – control playback directly from the popup → cleaner ui – refined visuals for windows 11 → smoother volume control – better per-app management no bloat. no subscription. just a better daily driver. built because the original was almost perfect.

Name: Thesis statment generator
Tagline: Struggling to start your essay? Just fill in the blanks
Description: Create a strong, academic thesis statement in seconds with our free AI tool. Perfect for students writing essays, research papers, and argumentative writing.

Name: RoomLooks
Tagline: RoomLooks is a living wall of room inspiration.
Description: RoomLooks is a living wall of room inspiration—looks, corners, and small moments with story, mood, and details you can bring into your space.

Name: SimplyBudget AI (v4)
Tagline: Manage Finances Effortlessly
Description: SimplyBudget rethinks money tracking for teens and everyday users. Transactions sync instantly with no refresh, logos are automatically attached for clarity, and budgets are easy to understand at a glance. A redesigned add transaction flow with haptic feedback makes logging fast and satisfying. Secure Google sign in, profile personalization, and a clean modern UI make budgeting simple and enjoyable. Fully designed and developed end to end by a 17 year old developer.
